author: Football Italia staff
title: Fassone: 'Disappointed in the Lega'
description: Former Milan director Marco Fassone agrees somewhat with Monza CEO Adriano Galliani, claims UEFA must scrap FFP this year and feels the chaos in the Lega Serie A repels potential foreign investors.
content:
Former Milan director Marco Fassone agrees somewhat with Monza CEO Adriano Galliani, claims UEFA must scrap FFP this year and feels the chaos in the Lega Serie A repels potential foreign investors.
The former Rossoneri CEO works as a consultant for the inves… [+2181 chars]
